MACHINARIA TV

MACHINARIA is a game that lets you

use news broadcasting

to manipulate people's opinion,

needs and emotions...

MACHINARIA was selected to

showcase *M.i.M.o at

Alt.Ctrl.GDC 2019 at San Francisco's

Game Developers Conference...

M.i.M.o is a physical version

of a machine operated in the game.

The device is used to edit material

and evoke emotions in the audience...

Black Mamba Studio was created

in October 2018 by 4 friends

eager to create games, at the same

time explore the never ending

possibilities of development.
